remarks: The value of the finite recursive definition generator at a successor (special case where the characteristic function is a mapping abstraction and where the mapping class ` D ` is a proper class).  This is a technical lemma that can be used together with ~ frsucmpt to help eliminate redundant sethood antecedents.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frsucmpt.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
frsucmpt.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
frsucmpt.3 $e |- F/_ x D $.
frsucmpt.4 $e |- F = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |` _om ) $.
frsucmpt.5 $e |- ( x = ( F ` B ) -> C = D ) $.
frsucmptn $p |- ( -. D e. _V -> ( F ` suc B ) = (/) ) $.
